title: 21st Century Fox 's revenue 2011 to 2018
summary: Overall Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2014 to 2016.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, about 31.87 was reported at Year 2014
Minimum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 27.33 was reached at Year 2016
